website_summaries.verdict: A great alternative to traditional protein powders that will give you all the same benefits without upsetting your stomach.
pros: Boosts your energy and helps you recover more quickly from workouts
cons: It's difficult to stir in the powder  well because it tends to clump

customer_reviews.title: Joint pain disappeared.
customer_reviews.text: Good tasting, nutritious, satisfying, but more importantly, my joint pain has stopped. I was experiencing crippling joint pain. Knees, shoulders, elbows, ankles, hips. No more pain. I'm 64 and I can move freely and returned to a very active lifestyle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just started using this last month. I drink it ...
customer_reviews.text: Just started using this last month. I drink it hot in the morning with a spoonful of coconut oil. I find I'm not hungry for a while after drinking this, it's satisfying. I've noticed that my belly is flatter, no bloating, which is a big plus. Only negative I can find is that is isn't "delicious". I've reordered.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa W.

customer_reviews.title: Crohns banana lover
customer_reviews.text: Banana is by far my favorite. I have tried the chocolate, coffee and vanilla. These are so good! I mix with plain water. I do it as a meal replacement 5 days a week and I have Crohns, this is the first of the sort that I have ever been able to stomach.
customer_reviews.author: Farmers1wife

customer_reviews.title: Best protein in its class!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this particular brand and flavor for months, I use it in my bulletproof coffee recipe in the morning and it is awesome. I do use a countertop or immersion blender and it mixes just fine. The flavor is mild vanilla with no 'beefy' or 'meaty' aftertaste as I have had with a few other proteins. Will buy this product again and again. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kat Leffler

customer_reviews.title: Huge stevia taste
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this product but sadly I couldn't even stomach a few sips. I bought the chocolate flavor and all it tastes like is stevia. It has a huge chemical sweetener taste and doesn't taste like chocolate at all. I even tried heating it up and adding more cocoa powder, vanilla, and cinnamon but it didn't do any good. For people who like stevia I can see this being really great but if you are like me and know that you hate anything with stevia in it then I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: John Murray

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: No it does not have any flavor (especially beef when it is a chicken bone broth). I've been using this as well as the vanilla and turmeric flavors for over a year and they are all awesome! They do not bloat my stomach like whey protien and they are not foaming at all. In my smoothie I make every morning I use either almond milk or a mixture of coconut milk(canned) and coconut water depending on what type of smoothie I'm making. I have all kinds of digestive issues and this helps a lot! Wonderful thumbs up product,
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Green

customer_reviews.title: Tastes like Vanilla Chicken
customer_reviews.text: The nutrients are there. I imagine it will do wonderful things for my hair skin and nails but i can taste a slight undertone of chicken in my morning vanilla protein smoothie. Maybe if you make it differently than i do (2 cups spinach, a scoop of protein and water) it would mask it. I cant gulp it past my tongue to get it down but wont be reordering.
customer_reviews.author: Shotziepa

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I love this protein! It's the only one that hasn't messed up my GI system. It's sourced from chicken broth. (Doesn't taste like chicken, don't worry.) It has good flavor, not cloyingly sweet like other stevia sweetened products can be, it's paleo-friendly, and has 20 grams of protein per 25 gram scoop. I like to mix mine with almond milk, a banana, I add in PB Fit powder which also helps up the protein content, and chia or ground flax seed. Overall I'm very satisfied, just wish it had slightly more protein content per scoop. I will definitely be buying more and trying out the other flavors!
customer_reviews.author: Denise Ferrat

customer_reviews.title: The flavor is soooo disgusting. It took all my strength not to puke
customer_reviews.text: The flavor is soooo disgusting. It took all my strength not to puke. Taste like a burnt bullion and its very bitter. I mixed it with hot water. Ooohhh yuck!!! A waste of money because I couldnt finish it. I tried.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: I love, love, love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I use this powdered Chocolate Bone Broth Protein in my Bulletproof coffee every morning (my morning breakfast meal). I love the taste and it is by far my favorite flavor, although you would be able to use the Pure (plain flavor) in other recipes or the Vanilla in drinks, especially fruit smoothies. Seems expensive, but I feel stronger, less pain in my hands from my arthritis (although I think part of that is b/c of the Brain Octane oil) since beginning this protocol last March, 2017.
customer_reviews.author: J. Docken

customer_reviews.title: Feeling like a million bucks again!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff has helped me feel so much better! I have been slogging thru adrenal fatigue and pre menopause for a couple years, and since I started drinking bone broth smoothies instead of my usual breakfast, I have been floored at the difference. I keep telling my sister (who clued me in to ancient nutrition) that it is fantastic to feel human again! I don’t generally write reviews, but am so thankful for this change that I had to post something.
customer_reviews.author: JoMo

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Please with the taste and convenience of this product. Only drawback is it's kind of pricey.
customer_reviews.author: marki

customer_reviews.title: SWEET LORD this can’t be the real flavor!!!
customer_reviews.text: My first review ever for anything!!! Literally this powder tastes like a live chicken feathers, beak,feet and a fully loaded colon was dipped head to toe in batter, then deep fried near the point of burning then pulled out and promptly put in a grinder then packaged for sale. Even in the best home blended juice it will defeat and overpower any flavor!! The taste took 24+ hours to get out of my mouth. Good luck drinking this!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mellisa C.

customer_reviews.title: Know I am getting my protein fast
customer_reviews.text: I really like this protein powder. At first I thought it tasted a little weird to me but I put some stevia in it. Now I do not use the stevia at all. I mix it with a half of a banana, one raw egg, 1/2 cup of milk, a little water, and that’s my breakfast every morning. It does get quite foamy in the blender so I run everything first to chop up the banana and then I add the powder last for a quick spin. I would say the only bad thing about it is the hefty price of it.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Terry

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this.
customer_reviews.text: My favorite way to enjoy this is to add to heated Almond milk or Almond Coconut milk. Have not tried with Coconut milk yet. Tastes delicious to me. On my third container now.
customer_reviews.author: Ginny

customer_reviews.title: Good basic protein source for blending
customer_reviews.text: Good ingredients that cover a wide range of needs. Flavor isn't over the top one way or another, rather "slightly " savory - I add to almond milk and sometimes a natural sweetener, ice and blend for a good healthy boost first thing in the morning. I did try it with hot water for an afternoon boost of protein as suggested on the label, but didn't enjoy the flavor, tasted a bit like weak dirty water. Blecchhh....Otherwise, I believe this to be a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Smithie

customer_reviews.title: My Coffee's New BFF
customer_reviews.text: Working for a protein ingredient supplier (no, my company does not supply any ingredients for this product), I have tried TONS and TONS of collagen and bone broth products on the market. Flavored animal protein blends often have an "off" flavor, or a strange sweetness that just doesn't play well with the other ingredients. I assumed this product would be the same. However, I was pleasantly surprised! It tastes so good! I now use 1/3 scoop in my coffee everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Liz G.

customer_reviews.title: Finally a protein that does not cause pain
customer_reviews.text: I've tired every type of protein source available on the market with the result of painful digestion. This one causes me no pain. The chocolate is good especially as a smoothie with berries added. You need to tolerate the taste of stevia.
customer_reviews.author: Ms M

customer_reviews.title: First day use. Will update with time
customer_reviews.text: First day use. Will update with time. I share this review because of immediate affects, and comparison/contrast of BCAA mixes. Firstly, constant energy; no highs that peak, then crash. On the contrary- constant energy. Secondly, no stomach issues. Zero. In fact, I’m getting a small cleanse, which is only beneficial. Taste- not too bad; knowing the pluses Of this supplement, the taste is not a factor. Pain relief- nothing to add yet. Will with time. Blending power- blends great with spoon. I’ll finish with this- reviews are excellent, and it’s a natural supplement, so that says enough for me.
customer_reviews.author: Clinton L.

customer_reviews.title: My favorite protein powder
customer_reviews.text: My go-to protein powder. Tastes very good, good texture when blended and filling. I usually use 1 cup frozen blueberries, 2 cups frozen strawberries, handful of greens, two scoops barley grass powder, 2 tsp acai powder, 1 tsp moringa powder, handful of fresh cranberries and 2 scoops protein powder, 16 oz water into ninja. Makes two thick smoothies . Delish
customer_reviews.author: Karen Marie

customer_reviews.title: not great but not awful
customer_reviews.text: i do have more energy and recover faster after working out. At 74, I can use all the energy I can get. I ordered the vanilla flavor. I use a blender adding some coconut or almond milk in a blender and sometimes a banana. Taste is ok, not great but not awful. I'm looking for the energy boost not a gourmet meal. I find that i need to take it at least 5 out of every 7 days to maintain energy levels.
customer_reviews.author: jawturbo

customer_reviews.title: Flavor of the "Pure" is awful
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the "Pure" variety of this product in order to mix with savory foods since I dont always want a sweet protein shake. I was hoping this would have little to no taste or if anything taste like chicken broth. I have now tried mixing it into 3 different savory soups and it makes the soup taste horrible. The flavor is hard to describe but whatever it is, it is not good. Bummed since this was one of the few brands providing a not sweet option.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Evans

customer_reviews.title: Violent diarrhea! The worst shake I have tried!
customer_reviews.text: Gurgling stomach, went to toilet 6x, rubbed my bootie raw, pooped out all my nutrition. Seems like a great shake for losing weight. I want to add I have tried many shakes and never had this problem! Its BS to suggest you have to get used to it. I don't have to get used to diarrhea! I will just get a better shake! In fact I already did!
customer_reviews.author: Pinky Lew

customer_reviews.title: I got the vanilla and it’s awesome. I’ve tried the chocolate as well and will ...
customer_reviews.text: I discovered this at Sprouts market for almost 50 bucks and found it here for FAR less! I don’t eat grains,most dairy, legumes,starches, carbs, or a lot of fat for different health reasons. I also have a lot of gut issues and protein powered ALWAYS upsets my stomach. This TATSES incredible, doesn’t hurt my stomach, and I am thrilled to have found it. I got the vanilla and it’s awesome. I’ve tried the chocolate as well and will be getting that next.
customer_reviews.author: peggy aagard

customer_reviews.title: Don't put it in juices or juice mixtures, gets weird foamy
customer_reviews.text: this is only a review on how you should prepare it, not yet for effects. It recommends putting it in a milk or almond milk smoothie, and now I get why. I put it in my morning mix of blended kale and orange juice, and it made everything all weird foamy. If I'd put it in milk, I think it would have been fine.
customer_reviews.author: theredheadsaid

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: I am dairy free and gluten free and wanted to give this brand a shot. I noticed after 2-3x of using it was upsetting my stomach for some odd reason. I wrote customer service and they gladly allowed me to return and received a full refund. For others with a less sensitive stomach, it does taste great with a banana and almond butter. Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: ak81

customer_reviews.title: Coconut milk bananas chia seeds and bone broth blended awesome breakfast meal
customer_reviews.text: My breakfast after my workout, lost inches around my waist feeling energizing. Coconut milk bananas chia seeds and bone broth blended awesome breakfast meal, holds you up until lunch SALADS
customer_reviews.author: peach

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and high scoring with the CLP!
customer_reviews.text: Pros: -Doesn't smell bad (an issue I've had with other brands) -Scores well with the Clean Label Project in regards to heavy metal and other toxic contaminates -Tastes great when mixed with something flavores, such as CarbMaster chocolate milk. I can easily drink this daily with no problems. -No stomach upset as other brands have caused. I have not used it long enough to get any pain relief, will update this review if that happens. Cons -Clumps and froths when a shaker bottle is used. I need to use an immersion blender to get it to dissolve -Has a rather bitter aftertaste when mixed with plain milk.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Hated it- clumps and doesn't taste good
customer_reviews.text: Hated it! This formula is meant meant to be drank hot (it's like a hot chocolate type of drink). It doesn't mix well and clumps in hot water. Besides not mixing well, it doesn't taste good. It is SUPER sweet and slightly too salty. I have tried A LOT of proteins and this was one of my least favs. I think Isopure and Genpro are the best protein I've tried so far.
customer_reviews.author: bfk03

customer_reviews.title: This really helps!
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff. Helps me look young and I am going to be 58 years old. It helps!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cubanlover

customer_reviews.title: Thank goodness for THIS!
customer_reviews.text: I have Crohn's Disease and Ulcerative Colitis and the smell of regular bone broth just gags me. I would never be able to use bone broth if it wasn't for this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Savell

customer_reviews.title: Good if you like the taste of turmeric with light tones
customer_reviews.text: I like the taste of this powder and I mix it with my favorite, spinach/honey/banana/blueberries. The taste is good for me when I want to mix up my flavors. I usually go with chocolate but from time to time I like to change the flavor. The only downfall is that you have to mix the powder in room temperature water before adding it to the blender because if the milk/water is cold the mix tends to clog up but it's no biggie for me.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: I almost gave 4 stars because it smells terrible. It smells like a grass
customer_reviews.text: I get this for my 86 year old mother. She has a hard time swallowing and was having trouble with her legs, but once she started this she has improved immensely. I almost gave 4 stars because it smells terrible. It smells like a grass. I imagine it tastes terrible also, but it is worth the benefits.
customer_reviews.author: libertyrose

customer_reviews.title: Stomach Ache
customer_reviews.text: It made my stomach hurt every time it drank it. Had to stop using it!!😞
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wasted Cash
customer_reviews.text: Was so anxious to receive this pumpkin flavored item. However when opened the powder was half-way full in the can. Was very dissatisfied and frustrated especially for the price and the respect I have for both men behind the product. Lots of lumps in both hot or cold water. Using a blender with other ingredients no lumps. So if one has no blender, one is stuck drinking a lumpy drink. For a half-filled can, the price should be half the price or the can should be much smaller and the hype that it blends well should be modified. Not worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Lexisn

customer_reviews.title: The best of the best!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot tell you how many protein powders I have tried over the years. Most of them give me an upset stomach, however, this one does not. It taste great, it mixes well and has all the great bone broth benefits. I also love no matter what diet program I experiment with, this one always the ingredients that are compliant. High protein, low carb, low to no sugar, low fat, and low calorie. I don't watch fat and calorie but for those who do, it's low. This one sure is a winner which I will continue to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Joann O'Toole

customer_reviews.title: Great afternoon pick me up
customer_reviews.text: I have had to cut out meat and dairy from my diet and this has been a fantastic afternoon addition to my meal plan. It has a decent flavor but does not mix well. I had to get a shake blender for the office to blend this product in my cashiew milk. It does curb my appetite and leave me full and satisfied through the late day. I would recommend this as long as you have a way to mix it.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Vanilla is gross
customer_reviews.text: I bought the vanilla, but I don’t taste any vanilla. It’s just gross and I’ve tried making smoothies with different fruits to try and disguise the flavor, but to no avail. I can’t even bring myself to try again. I wasn’t expecting deliciousness in bone broth powder, but not something so offensive that I can’t even stomach it. I am used to drinking bone broth and used to probiotic powders and things like that, but this powder just has a bad taste that I’m unable to disguise. I’m so disappointed that I spent almost $40 on something I can’t use.
customer_reviews.author: Jazzer Cyndi

customer_reviews.title: ... can have it later thru the day or night excellent flavor, pretty thick
customer_reviews.text: use w sugar free almond milk and the bullet blender can make extra and it doesn't get watery in the frig so I can have it later thru the day or night excellent flavor, pretty thick, if you want thicker add an ice cube
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A good morning pick-me-up
customer_reviews.text: Blended with coconut milk, banana and a greens powder, the flavor is fine. I feel good after my morning smoothie, and notice the difference when I don't have it. I also like this in hot veggie broth during the winter. Check the amount to use and the scooper. A serving is supposed to be 22 g. My scooper said 53, so I use 1/2 scoop. Any more than that and I don't like the flavor.
customer_reviews.author: TR

customer_reviews.title: Good but, BEWARE
customer_reviews.text: Product flavor and service were good. Unfortunately I had a severe allergic reaction and am unable to continue to use. Although the package does caution about being allergic, there is nothing in the ingredients that is a known allergen to me. I’m puzzled, disappointed, and beyond grateful that I survived this experience. I have never tried anything like this before, but thought it would help me stay healthier as I age. I’m 55 years old. I do not have any of the conditions for which they suggest you consult a doctor. Clearly I will do much more research before considering anything like this again.
customer_reviews.author: kbs

customer_reviews.title: Tastes horrible.
customer_reviews.text: This was beef broth disgusting. I love broth and fell in love with drinking broth as extra protein in the day, especially in the morning when it’s still cold out. I couldn’t even force myself to drink this and I can eat or drink almost anything. So many other better brands. Not worth it and returned this ASAP.
customer_reviews.author: AURORA SLUSHER

customer_reviews.title: Bad Aftertaste.
customer_reviews.text: I can't yet speak of the quality/effectiveness of this powder, but the aftertaste is horrible. I got the chocolate flavor. I tried mixing it with almond milk, as the label suggests, and I had to choke it down and chase it with water after each drink. I will try mixing it in with a smoothie. Maybe the taste will be better disguised that way, but I do not recommend just mixing it straight with water/milk/almond milk/etc. It has a very strong aspartame/fake sweetener aftertaste.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Beaver

customer_reviews.title: Tastes the best and works great
customer_reviews.text: Tried this Bone Broth Protein powder first, and then tried others. Returning to Ancient Nutrition Bone Broth Protein, Vanilla. Tastes the best and works great. Easy to use. My nails are even growing!!!
customer_reviews.author: kd321548

customer_reviews.title: This is great stuff. I've ordered it twice already
customer_reviews.text: This is great stuff. I've ordered it twice already. My nails are stronger and are growing quickly. Seems like my hair is doing the same thing. I add it to smoothies, soups and other liquids. Very versatile for either sweets or savories.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: No shipping if you have prime!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the product for quite some time purchasing through the manufacturers website. It is a clean product. The difference in ordering through Amazon is that I can order one at a time with prime as opposed to being charged shipping on the site if under $100. It does have a bone broth flavor but can be easily masked with fruit in a smoothie. The price is same as site. Would be nice if it were a tad cheaper. Good product!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia S

customer_reviews.title: The Best Protein Powder in the market!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know what I would do without bone broth. I recently had TM Jaw surgery and would not have been able to heal without Bone Broth. The Ancient BB is Awesome, tastes good and is very healing for the body on so many levels. I appreciate just how clean this product is, without a lot of fillers sweeteners and such. It is just the best protein powder out there!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Napua

customer_reviews.title: Tastes Terrible
customer_reviews.text: This product is absolutely disgusting! I’m super bummed I was excited to try it. I’m still going to try and choke it down in my smoothies. You can totally taste the Bone broth mixed with the vanilla it is very bizarre. Not sure how anyone says this tastes good! I’m going to still try it for the rest of the week and see if I notice any benefits at all.
customer_reviews.author: Tarron

customer_reviews.title: Gross
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product but I think the monk fruit in it ruins it (I got the chocolate flavor), it has this weird strong sweetness that almost stung the back of my throat and lingers. I wonder if it's like stevia where some people taste it as bitter and some do not. I am not super picky normally and can choke down any green smoothie, etc, but not this! I couldn't even drink it:(
customer_reviews.author: Erin P

customer_reviews.title: ... of this at Whole Foods and it was really good so I ordered it but it has a burnt ...
customer_reviews.text: I tried a sample of this at Whole Foods and it was really good so I ordered it but it has a burnt bitter taste to it. It's pretty strong and I can't get past it. Maybe they need to change the way it's processed but it really tastes bad. I also tried the banana flavor and that one smells really nice but has that same strong bitter burnt taste in it. I will try a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Traci King

customer_reviews.title: No more knee pain
customer_reviews.text: seriously, after high impact exercise since the early 80's, I have begun to fear a knee replacement was in my future bc of the daily knee stiffness or pain if I wore the wrong shoes, I would pay for it for days...after seeing this product, adding it to my coffee the next morning, it literally wiped out my joint pains that I am so used to that I didn't catch on to the third day that I had no aches!! I am now using the bone broth protein powder with the colllagen peptides and prefer it, actually, except that it does not dissolve as easily
customer_reviews.author: jean g kopf

customer_reviews.title: Helps my digestion and keeps me from snacking all morning long
customer_reviews.text: I can't explain why but this stuff improves my digestion. I also find that it helps me feel full throughout the morning so I don't snack so much. You can taste what I assume is marrow from the bone broth and while you can sort of mask this with chocolate syrup, or fruit, you can't really get rid of it. It works so well that I'm willing to put up the taste. I don't buy it from Amazon anymore since my local Earth Fare has it cheaper but I would buy it here again if I had to.
customer_reviews.author: slink

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product.
customer_reviews.text: Best tasting vanilla protein powder ever. Not too sweet. Has a nice tangy flavor. Blends super easy, and it actually tastes like real vanilla. I love blending in some berries, or just mixing with water and using the mixed protein as the liquid in my chia seed pudding. Even better, I get no bloat, no indigestion, no heartburn, no constipation (which I get from nearly every other protein powder) and it really is helping me build quality muscle, which is what I’m trying to do. All in all, a great product that I encourage everyone to buy. It also has helped reduce my incidence of joint pain after a long run or heavy lift.
customer_reviews.author: yan

customer_reviews.title: This taste amazing
customer_reviews.text: How on earth can something this yummy be so healthy?! Okay so my holistic doctor told me about all of the benefits of bone broth. I tried it and it kind of grossed me out thinking of bones boiling in water for hours and then me drinking it. Okay, I’m weird! Anyways, that’s when I heard of bone broth protein powder. I didn’t have high hopes since the bone broth was pretty gross but I decided to give this a shot. It seriously tastes like a chai tea Frappuccino!! I just blend it with almond milk and ice and it is amazing amazing amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Christea

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I hate protein shakes because I feel like there is nothing but chemicals and artificial stuff in them, but this stuff has a short ingredient list and is paleo friendly. It does not upset my stomach or make me bloated like other shakes do. Does not taste fantastic( its still a protein shake not a milkshake) but I can down it fairly easy in quick gulps. I was afraid it would taste like chicken or something, but it doesn't.
customer_reviews.author: L Block

customer_reviews.title: Tastes Terrible
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to get this. I read where you can mix it up and drink it like chicken broth for a cup of soup! This is not so. I tastes nothing like chicken broth at all. It was so bad. There is no way I can even mask the taste and I tried multiple times. It was a total waste of money... I am just thankful I did not make a big pot of chicken soup and put this in it. There would be no way it could taste good after adding this.....
customer_reviews.author: Linda Lee

customer_reviews.title: Yum! Mix with coconut milk!
customer_reviews.text: Taste great blended with almond milk! Does not mix well in hot drinks, definitely need to use your blender. I am buying more! I had to update because I just mixed it with coconut milk in a shaker! Delicious 😋 Healthy dessert replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie C Green

customer_reviews.title: I can’t recommend this for human consumption, the taste is too hard to stomach
customer_reviews.text: Not edible by itself, at least based on my taste. Though I’m giving 3 stars since that is usually what to expect when getting an unflavored version. I blended with chocolate and some potent ingredients which masked the flavor somewhat, but was still hard to stomach. Maybe I’ll salvage the rest to use it for animal food, I’ve heard that you can make healthy dog treats with it. The only value that I got out of this product is that I now appreciate the flavored version MUCH MORE!
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Beware of flavor
customer_reviews.text: This was one of the more disgusting things I've ever tried to consume. I had high hopes as I'm finding plant based proteins are becoming difficult to digest & am lactose intolerant. This product was a total disappointment. I could not get past the first gulp. I pride myself on my ability to eat off tasting things but this literally made me gag. Returning.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Wish i could exchange for a different flavor!
customer_reviews.text: I just can't get past the bitterness and blah flavor. This is the first bone broth from ancient nutrition that i just do not like. It's a shame because i love the brand. I had one cup, and haven't gone back. I guess that's why it was the only flavor on sale. My husband won't even try it because of the unpleasant aroma and my children could smell it from across the house and asked, "What in the world is that awful smell?" Sorry guys! Wish i could exchange this one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: I purchased both the chocolate and vanilla Ancient Nutrition Bone Broth Powders. I've never used protein powders before and was looking for a quick nutritious meal replacement for when I was in a rush. Like many people, I found that when I was in a hurry quick meal options weren't always healthy ones. So far I've made smoothies with greens, frozen fruit, almond milk, and some type of fat source (i.e., avocado, nut butter, etc.) The only disappointment is that I wish they were a bit more filling. I'm happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Vanilla flavor is not good
customer_reviews.text: Do not waste your money!! I really do not like the flavor at all or the smell. I tried it twice, the first time with almond milk and I was not a fan. The second attempt I added strawberries and Almond butter and it made it a Little bit better but it’s not a flavor I am crazy about. I Don’t recommend this flavor at all. I might order the chocolate one to see if it’s better.
customer_reviews.author: Lianet Navarro

customer_reviews.title: No whey,high protein,gut health!
customer_reviews.text: Cons- •It smells like dog food as you initially mix it. Helps to keep in fridge for half hr or so for the smell to go away. •It makes a huge difference to have a mixing glass with a little ball or spring in it to mix everything well. Pros- It tastes good! It has a lot of protein! Good for gut health and the brain as well as working out. Good for elderly. I like to add a little chocolate syrup, a nutt butter,mct oil, soaked chia seeds/ground flax seeds or fruit would be nice paired with this for a filling shake. One of the best protein shakes I've had. No whey taste.
customer_reviews.author: Love

customer_reviews.title: Too Sweet
customer_reviews.text: The aftertaste from the sweetener is very strong. The maker needs to cut way back on the sweetener. I would prefer none & sweeten it myself
customer_reviews.author: Jim Shortz

customer_reviews.title: Tastes terrible
customer_reviews.text: Imagine putting chocolate in your chicken soup. That’s what this tastes like. I get extremely tired after consuming as well which tells me I’m allergic to one or more ingredients - likely the mass amounts of stevia etc they must use in an attempt to disguise the flavor. Once this Keto fad goes away, so too will this product.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Oliver

customer_reviews.title: TOO SWEET.
customer_reviews.text: It tastes so sweet. I held my nose and was able to down a bit, but instantly after you're left with this extremely sickly sweet aftertaste that is barely helped with water. It doesn't taste like regular sugar either so be warned if you're not a fan of sickly sweet drinks, this might be awful for you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer2

customer_reviews.title: Love the taste.
customer_reviews.text: I love the taste. Very chocolatety and creamy. I added 1/2 frozen banana and cinnamon and cold water blended it up and it was so delicious. I felt very comfortable drinking this although I never subscribed to taking protein powders before. Knowing that it’s bone broth I know that I’m having something healthy and this being approved by Dr. Axe makes it even better. My 2 yr old niece and nephew likes helping me make the shake and they love the taste as well. I think if kids like the taste of something then it must be really good. It has also helped me achieve my goals of gaining muscle; I have this after my workout on evenings. 🙂 Shelly
customer_reviews.author: Shellyann Dwarika

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Tastes like weak beef broth. Goes great with tomato based soup / sauce / drinks.
customer_reviews.author: Nom de Guerre

customer_reviews.title: Best Natural Protein on the Market. Hands Down.
customer_reviews.text: This has become my new favorite protein and my morning routine. I'm now making smoothies every morning and loving the flavor, and more importantly, the consistency in which this protein mixes with everything. I've tried countless other "Natural" protein powders and none compare to the Bone Broth Protein. For months now, I have been ordering both the Vanilla and the Coffee flavor. Could not be happier with these products.
customer_reviews.author: yarby

customer_reviews.title: Chocolate flavor tastes like chocolate chicken soup.
customer_reviews.text: I honestly am not sure how I am going to finish this, I can't separate the chocolate flavor from the savoriness of the chicken broth. I've tried blending it into chocolate peanut butter banana smoothies and berry smoothies, it ends up adding an unpleasant umami to both that cannot be fully overpowered by the fruit/sweetness. May have to give it away to someone else who can enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle W.

customer_reviews.title: Should have listened to others
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the vanilla bone broth protein even though I wasn't entirely satisfied with the response of it not being from pastured chickens and it tastes really off/bad. I have used the vanilla multi collagen protein powder before and it's been fine but the bone broth is awful. It's bitter and has a horrible sour taste. I can't drink it in my coffee like I usually do. I am spilling it out. I emailed Ancient Nutrition to ask about their return policy. I hate to throw away a $40 container.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Stern-Enzi

customer_reviews.title: bad flavor - stomach problems
customer_reviews.text: The stevia flavor is overwhelming. The sweet and sour aftertaste masks the chocolate flavor and the flavor of the other ingredients I add to my smoothies. I won’t be purchasing this product again for that reason. I updated my review from two stars to one star. This gives me horrible stomach problems. Came here to see that others had the same experience. I’m throwing it out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works fantastically
customer_reviews.text: The flavor is kind of strange, but the effects are wonderful! My skin looks amazing! and my workouts are powering up. Good product. Just blend it with something else to cut the strange flavor, or just chug it down and get used to making a funny face because it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Katy

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly good taste
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly good taste. I feel a difference in my joints and stomach function after 3 days of a bone broth fast using this product. I would buy this bone broth again.
customer_reviews.author: Chuckie

customer_reviews.title: Product
customer_reviews.text: This product is very good. It does taste like vanilla, vanilla milk perhaps. I just started taking this but i have noticed a difference in my digestion. I am not passing so much gas anymore and less joint pains. I would definately keep purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: felicia c.

customer_reviews.title: "Pure" has great benefits, not great flavor
customer_reviews.text: The pure exists for a reason... to omit the "extra flavor additives", so I'm grateful I got it, but to consume a full heaping scoop I would need to mix it with 1 serving of Halo Vanilla Ice Cream (only 150 calories or so). Alternatively, a daily 1/4 of a scoop mixed in with flavored cold brew is probably a great use of it's health benefits. On this product, I just feel better and my cracking knees goes away.
customer_reviews.author: Sam M.

customer_reviews.title: Great product but too expensive.
customer_reviews.text: I love this bone broth protein. The flavor is great and I can see a difference in my hair, skin, and nails and I just feel better when using it. I’m giving it 3 stars because it’s so expensive I can’t keep using it. It would cost me $80 a month to be able to do it daily
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Definitely not a sipping drink. UGG
customer_reviews.text: The taste is so bad, I have to hold my breath, hold my nose and drink it down and one gulp so I don’t have to taste it. It does not mix easily without a blender. The fact that is supposed to be so good for me is the only reason I will finish the container.
customer_reviews.author: rita Glenn gray

customer_reviews.title: Love the taste and that it's Paleo!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a Paleo bone broth protein supplement and found this. Not only is the protein powder delicious (like chocolate milk!), but it has virtually no sugar and only Paleo ingredients. This product is adding some much need supplementary protein into my diet to help me meet my fitness goals, as I can only ingest so much meat in one day! I highly recommend this for the taste and health benefits.
customer_reviews.author: Zoë D.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t taste very good
customer_reviews.text: 3 1/2 Stars: Not a fan of the taste. I’ve tried the vanilla as well, which is MUCH better (taste-wise). The Pure flavor is exactly that - PURE bone broth, but not exactly tasty like mom’s home cooked broth. The benefits of this powder is great (especially for intermittent fasting), but not something I look forward to drinking.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine Family

customer_reviews.title: Great Protein Option for Dairy Intolerant
customer_reviews.text: Love this. I use the individual packets when I travel, and the tub while at home. I mix it with chocolate almond milk, and it keeps me full for hours. Great option if you can’t do whey protein, and more filling than most plant based proteins I’ve had. Taste takes a bit of getting used to, but it’s not bad in the vanilla flavor. (I’d avoid the unflavored version- it was gross.)
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: The best Protein powder
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best Protein powder I have ever had. It's filling, it taste good, and it goes all long ways. I have tried many others and the taste was absolutely dreadful but this is sweet and taste like vanilla. It doesn't have a strong protein drink flavor like the rest. I mix mine whith ice, banana, cashew butter, unsweetened almond milk. But in a rush I just mix it with the almond milk and it is really yummy. I will definitely be ordering more!
customer_reviews.author: Britnay Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Open container
customer_reviews.text: This is the second container I ordered, loved the first one but this one was never sealed correctly. I didn't notice it for almost a month as I was finishing the last container and then when I switched to this new one I saw the seal was open so I just threw it away, what a waste. May have to look for another supplier.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Nutrition
customer_reviews.text: Don't think that buying this in vanilla flavor that it is going to taste like Vanilla. Bone broth in general is a taste you have to get used to. It's a great source of protein if you are Keto or Whiole30. The Vanilla flavor does soften the taste a bit for smoothie's and such. I am thinking of buying the original flavor and adding it to soups or just carrying some with me when I travel so that I can get a great cup of energy when I want it.
customer_reviews.author: EL

customer_reviews.title: Guar gum is a no go for me
customer_reviews.text: I really really wanted to like this product. I needed something to get extra protein in my diet without having to consume a ton of meat but after consuming it for like the fifth time I noticed I kept having problems with gas and bloating. It's got to be the guar gum.
customer_reviews.author: Helen Forrest

customer_reviews.title: Only 20 servings verses a full month supply.
customer_reviews.text: Pro: I love Ancient Nutrition Chocolate Flavor Bone Broth. I follow Dr. Axe and trust his products. Con: Why I gave it 2 stars. The container is way smaller and only 20 servings per container. I drink it once a day as a meal replacement. Other comparable products offer 30 servings for the same price. I am very disappointed in the doctor I trusted.
customer_reviews.author: Rená Docman

customer_reviews.title: Tastes Bad, False Advertising
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I have celiac and wanted to gain weight. This stuff tastes horrible. Basically tastes like chicken broth mixed with vanilla extract. What a waste of $40. You can't mix it with just a spoon, definitely need to buy one of those blender bottles. Don't be fooled by this product's advertising; it simply tastes bad and is not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: macularius

customer_reviews.title: Does not mix well
customer_reviews.text: I've tried adding this product to water, coffee and almond milk. It stays clumpy even using a whisk. It was only a little better in the blender. I'm giving up on it even though it cost a good amount. Hope you have better luck with it and get your money's worth!
customer_reviews.author: Joan M.

customer_reviews.title: Better alternative than most and great substitute for whey
customer_reviews.text: Since I'm lactose intolerant, whey is just not an option for me. I've never enjoyed tasting and taking any beef, egg, soy or vegan alternatives. As a strength and conditioning coach, I wish there was more information on the quality of bone broth as an actual source of protein powder, but I've enjoyed some many gains over the year or so that I've had this as my supplement. For good measure, I've taken extra steps to add protein to post-workout shake, but I do know that bone broth protein according to ConsumerLab.com isn't favorable.
customer_reviews.author: S Chang

customer_reviews.title: Very nutritous and tastes good
customer_reviews.text: This blend of Bone Broth Powder (along with the Multicollagen Powder) with almond milk, berries and spinach is a great way to start off the day. The smoothie provides great nutrition and makes you feel energetic through the day. I find that my muscle aches (particularly in my shoulder) have started to subside. The only thing is that it is relatively expensive to maintain this routine, since you need to have all the ingredients all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Priya Hays

customer_reviews.title: Pumpkin Bone Broth
customer_reviews.text: This Ancient Nutrition bone broth isn't my favorite because the pumpkin spice flavor isn't strong enough for me. Also it is not as easy to blend into my coffee as the other flavors because there is a stickiness to the mixture. I have to use a electric stick blender to get a silky texture. One more step than I want to take early in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: Lindabev

customer_reviews.title: It's a great way to hit two birds with one stone.
customer_reviews.text: It's my everyday breakfast for the last six years. My doctor suggested I start drinking bone broth to help with my inflammation from my autoimmune diseases. I found this and have enjoyed it since. I blend it with unsweetened coconut milk in my Ninja blender. It comes out light and foamy. I usually get chocolate flavor, though vanilla is a nice change of pace. As for my inflammation, I definitely notice if I have to skip a morning, so I try not to. I also am grateful they redesigned the container to be a smaller diameter so it's easier to open.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Peters

customer_reviews.title: Yummy meal replacement to supplement weight loss
customer_reviews.text: I use this powder as a meal replacement/health supplement. I HAD a bi-lateral knee replacement 2 years ago and my general wellness was affected plus I added weight. My goal was to stay healthy while I burn 20 # of fat. I make the shakes with unsweetened almond milk. Yummy and it is working
customer_reviews.author: Susan Cox

customer_reviews.title: Best way to start your day.
customer_reviews.text: Started using Ancient Bone Broth in March 2018 and within 2 weeks I noticed improvement in energy levels, and joint health. I am amazed at how I can go up and down stairs that use to be a slow process, but now I'm moving with ease and strength. Each morning starts with a smoothie shake with scoop of this and your good to go till lunch.
customer_reviews.author: Jcm

customer_reviews.title: Very surprised and happy
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product now for 2 months. I replaced my morning protien with it and I have 1 piece of toast and put the powder in my coffee it adds a pleasant flavor. I have lost 6 pounds now and haven't changed anything else. I haven't gotten hungry either until lunch about 4 hours later and my energy has increased as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jim H

customer_reviews.title: Quite Possibly the Worst Tasting Protein Mix Ever Made
customer_reviews.text: This protein powder is quite possibly the worst tasting protein mix I've ever tasted. I couldn't comment on how great it can make you feel or anything else because it's simply terrible as far as taste. I've drank dozens of protein powders over the years and started getting an upset stomach due to food allergies (dairy/gluten etc) so wanted to try something different. Just can't get past the taste. It's unbearable. Alternatively I found a great tasting pea protein powder which checks all those boxes and doesn't make me want to vomit.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Hauer

customer_reviews.title: Taste good, blends realisticly
customer_reviews.text: I got the chocolate flavor, and it taste pretty good. I mix it with just water, and I eat it with my dinner after working out. I have tried other proteins (more specifically plant based), and they were not as enjoyable. The blending could be better, it takes about a minute and a half to mix with a spoon, but I'm not sure how much more efficient the blending could actually become considering the ingredients. It's really hard to tell if it is actually aiding my workouts, but it does add the extra protein daily so theoretically it should be helping. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for KETO Lifestyle
customer_reviews.text: I use this every morning for my low carb shake. While you have to get used to both the taste and the idea of it being bone broth, you're really tasting chocolate! it's good tasting, and I know I'm getting the protein I need. I didn't rate pain relief because that's not what I'm using it for. It blends just fine in my vanilla Almond Milk.
customer_reviews.author: MBel

customer_reviews.title: Purchase for my husband
customer_reviews.text: I purchase this for my husband who is 39 years but suffers with severe knee and joint pain,we have been using this only about 3 weeks ,but i can already see improvement
customer_reviews.author: Angelface

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!!
customer_reviews.text: The BEST form of protein i have ever had ( tried them all) its a MUST for your arsenal. Chocolate flavor is my fave. GREAT quality.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Crean

product_meta.title: Ancient Nutrition Bone Broth Protein Powder, 20g Protein Per Serving, Paleo, Low Carb Superfood, Vanilla, 20 Servings
feature_bullets: HIGH PROTEIN - Easily digestible vanilla bone broth protein powder provides 20g of protein per serving, add one level scoop (measuring scoop provided!) of bodybuilding, gut-friendly bone broth powder to your morning coffee, breakfast shake or smoothie to enjoy the delicious benefits of a protein-rich diet

PALEO AND ALLERGY-FRIENDLY - bone broth protein superfood is paleo friendly, free of common allergens and the ideal protein source for those who are sensitive to dairy, grains, eggs, beef, nuts and legumes

COLLAGEN TYPE II - Bone broth contains potassium, calcium, selenium & magnesium, and is rich in collagen type II & gelatin that help form connective tissue & healthy skin. Collagen/gelatin and amino acids in bone broth help seal openings in the gut lining and support gut integrity

THE ULTIMATE SUPERFOOD - Chicken bone broth contains only 2g of carbs per serving and is artisanally produced with no added salt, sugars, colors, preservatives or artificial ingredients. Carefully crafted quality you can trust and tested to be non-GMO, making this the ultimate superfood to get you through your day and your workout
Our Ancient Nutrition Promise: Not satisfied? Let us know and we’ll make it right for you!*
